title: Gamification-Based Mobile Course for Enhancing Mathematical Competencies: Leaderboard Strategy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic operations and problem-solving skills
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment, modular learning in 15-minute daily units, comprising a total of 60 modules.

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 85% weekly accuracy in solving math problems using a top-tier leaderboard strategy.
Learners improve self-efficacy by 30% through a bottom-tier leaderboard experience.
Learners score 4.0/5.0 or higher on engagement surveys when gamification elements are applied.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
